name: Chibi Emoji Sticker
description: Tags: emoji, sticker, chibi, flat design

inputs.label: Expression/Pose Action
inputs.default: Making a playful peace sign with both hands and winking

template: {expression}. Maintain the chibi aesthetic. Exaggerated, expressive big eyes. Soft facial lines. Background: Vibrant red with star or colorful confetti elements for decoration. Leave some clean white space around each sticker. Aspect ratio: 9:16
